More info See in Glossary Editor’s Secondary Textures module can associate additional Textures with edited sprites. A Shader A program that runs on the GPU. More info See in Glossary can then sample these secondary Textures to apply additional effects on the Sprite, such as normal mapping. Secondary Textures are currently

only supported by Sprite Renderers A component that lets you display images as Sprites for use in both 2D and 3D scenes. More info See in Glossary and are not available for other Renderer components.
